quote: He prayeth well  who loveth well Both man and bird and beast. He prayeth best  who loveth best All things both great and small  For the dear God who loveth us  He made and loveth all.
quote_letters: HE PRAYETH WELL WHO LOVETH WELL BOTH MAN AND BIRD AND BEAST HE PRAYETH BEST WHO LOVETH BEST ALL THINGS BOTH GREAT AND SMALL FOR THE DEAR GOD WHO LOVETH US HE MADE AND LOVETH ALL
